Main USP of the game is definitely the 7 characters. I liked the theme of the game. Cool, bright colors. Hats off to the creative guys who added Hobi+Jungkook banana incident from the past, within the game. 🙌 Curious to know what is the game about, how does scoring take place, how many lives/ chances each character will have? What will be different scenarios on the island. I'm assuming there will be good, fishing, boating, castle building, etc.. How many levels will this game have? Will they add the Tuna theme music for fishing level? Will it not be cool if they add the Butter music theme for food level? I am just thinking loud. Ofcourse this game looks like a group game, not a single user game. What more can we expect in a Island game? I am very very curiously waiting for the next episodes 😂💜 Thanks you BTS. Really appreciate how you keep us engaged and connected with your innovative and entertaining content 💜
